[[Image:The Microcosm, Vol.8 No.1.jpg|thumb|''Magazine cover'']]

'''''The Microcosm, Vol.8 No.1''''' is an issue of the magazine ''The Microcosm'', edited by Dorothy Una Ratcliffe and published in Spring [[1923]]. It includes the poem ''[[The City of the Gods]]'' (p. 8) by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
